title: Skippy and the 3 RRR's
brief_description: Shows how a first grade boy is taught reading, writing and arithmetic by a teacher who utilises the boy’s interests to help him to realise his own need for learning. He learns by experience that school is a fascinating place where he is made to feel part of the group and where he receives sympathetic understanding.
